Java SE 15 & JDK 15

Uses of Class
java.lang.ThreadLocal

Packages that use ThreadLocal
Package Description
java.lang
Provides classes that are fundamental to the design of the Java programming language.

  • Uses of ThreadLocal in java.lang

    Subclasses of ThreadLocal in java.lang
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  InheritableThreadLocal<T>
    This class extends ThreadLocal to provide inheritance of values from parent thread to child thread: when a child thread is created, the child receives initial values for all inheritable thread-local variables for which the parent has values.
    Methods in java.lang that return ThreadLocal
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static <S> ThreadLocal<S> ThreadLocal.withInitial​(Supplier<? extends S> supplier)
    Creates a thread local variable.
